title: Golang Pub/Sub: Why It’s Better When Combined With GoFr
author: Robert Kimani
description: To take full advantage of Golang’s capabilities in a pub/sub setup, the framework GoFr can help simplify the process and introduce powerful features.
cntitle: Golang 发布/订阅：为什么与 GoFr 结合使用会更好？
cndescription: 为了充分利用 Golang 在发布/订阅设置中的能力，GoFr 框架可以帮助简化流程并引入强大的功能。
